author: Jon Porter
title: Amazon’s Alexa voice assistant can now help you diagnose COVID-19
description: Amazon Alexa users in the US can now use the voice assistant to help diagnose cases of COVID-19, the disease caused by the novel coronavirus. You can ask “Alexa, what do I do if I think I have coronavirus?” for advice.
content:
Using information from US health authorities
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Amazon Alexa users in the US can now use the voice assistant as a first step towards diagnosing cases of COVID-19, the disease caused by the novel coronavirus, Amazon has a… [+1856 chars]
